**
! This mod won't work properly without a custom UnityPlayer.dll and the Classic Text Box Framework installed ! [
](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy3pixelremaster/mods/18)**


This mod adds portraits to the dialogue boxes based on those of [Final Fantasy VI Pixel Keeper (FF Record Keeper Sprites)](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/44) with the format of the GBA ports. Includes portraits for the default UI, [Shiryu's Custom UI](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/51), [Darker UI](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/41) ﻿, [Chrono Trigger UI](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/46), [FFVI UI Overhaul](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/4) and [SNES UI](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/5) mods.





The mod comes with 3 versions for each UI:


- **Pixel Keeper:** uses the designs of the default sprites of the Pixel Keeper mod.


- **Pixel Keeper - Amano Alt:** uses the designs of the default sprites of the Pixel Keeper mod, with the Amano version of Terra and classic Relm.


- **Pixel Keeper - Classic:** uses the classic alt. sprites designs based on the original SNES sprites.﻿





**Instructions:**


\- Download the [Classic Text Box Framework](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/18) and follow the instructions of that mod.


- Install the UI mod of your choice.


- Download, extract and replace the files of this mod on the "FINAL FANTASY VI PR" folder.




[![](https://i.imgur.com/6xfbTRi.png)](https://discord.gg/bSnpVBV) ﻿


Visit the [Moogle & Mods](https://discord.gg/bSnpVBV) ﻿ Discord to get new releases and join the community!


This mod does not include any fonts. To download custom fonts, view the [Font Modding Guide and Index](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2786311940) by @fugsnarf
